name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Frontend Developer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in leveraging **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Next.js** to deliver high-quality, high-performance web applications. My expertise encompasses a comprehensive understanding of **CSS**, **HTML**, and modern frontend practices including **micro frontends** and **web components**. I excel in implementing **NPM** for package management and utilize **unit testing frameworks** to ensure code quality and reliability.

In addition to my frontend skills, I possess hands-on experience with cloud technologies including **Azure Portal** and **infrastructure-as-code** solutions like **Pulumi** and **Terraform**. I am proficient in creating **CI/CD pipelines** within **Azure DevOps** to streamline deployments and enhance delivery processes.

My background includes building integrated platforms in various domains such as healthcare and finance, ensuring compliance with critical standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am adept at problem-solving, effective communication, and fostering collaboration within cross-functional teams, enabling the delivery of robust digital experiences.
